mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and elements for smaller screens to reduce horizontal scrolling and improve layout flow.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce image sizes and leverage browser caching to improve loading times.
seoOptimizationTip: Increase the use of relevant keywords in meta descriptions and page titles to improve search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Enhance navigation clarity by simplifying the menu structure and ensuring key information is easy to access.
tips: Consider adding more detailed local attraction information to attract potential guests.
